Effect.en: You can target 1 of your Spellcaster monsters that is banished or in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 "Witchcrafter" Spell from your Deck to your hand. During either player's turn, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target any number of your banished "Witchcrafter" Spells with different names; add them to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Witchcrafter Patronus" once per turn.

en: Target 1 Spellcaster to send to the Deck
